messages.subject: Re: Interesting Seasonal   Ritual-----OH--Kmart---UNDIES--kids sleeping routines
messages.msgSnippet: my 4 year old often goes to bed after me and puts himself to bed when he s ready.   his dad stays up late to work (computer graphics stuff) and he stays up and
messages.messageBody:
my 4 year old often goes to bed after me and puts himself to bed when he's
ready. his dad stays up late to work (computer graphics stuff) and he stays
up and works on our 2nd computer side by side. his normal or average time is
11ish. my therory is that he was born around 9 pm and by the time all had
settled it was around11pm so his first time sleeping after being born happens
to be his preferred time to sleep. who knows
-susan
sara woodall wrote:

> From: sara woodall <swoodall@...>
>
> > My kids are sometimes up until 2 AM
> > AM I alone!
> No, you're definitely not alone on this one. I seem to have given birth
> to an entire flock of night owls!
>
> Sara
